website_summaries.verdict: You'll pay a little more, but these Bose speakers live up to their highly respected brand name.
pros: Includes a round design that disperses sound in all directions
Sends sound across a large area with no problems
cons: Higher than average cost for outdoor speakers

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it - buy these!
customer_reviews.text: So i've had my share of cheap low level lighting attached blue tooth speakers from home depot. All garbage. I figured since we're building a nice pool time to put in nice sound. These do NOT disappoint. They are so loud and clear. i'm sure my whole neighborhood can hear them when i turn them up even 1/2 way. The video is with them playing at about 1/4 volume. Install was a cinch just splice 2 wires and you're good 2 go. Definitely want to bury these it really helps the bass shine rather than sound empty.
customer_reviews.author: snype

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Best sound quality. Same ones used at resorts. Love them. My neighbors not so much. But they don’t like fun.
customer_reviews.author: simple man

customer_reviews.title: Beware - "New" but sitting on the shelf for 10 years!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Aug 2018, I had to call service today for a popping noise. When the support rep checked my serial number, she told me they were manufactured in 2008! I've waited years to buy Bose speakers and am extremely disappointed. This is not a "NEW" $449 product when sitting on the shelf for 10 years. I really expected a lot more integrity from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Haadsma

customer_reviews.title: These ROCK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive at first, mainly due to the price. Did some research, read some reviews and finally pulled the trigger to purchase a pair of the 51. These speakers might be one of the best purchases I have made in awhile because they are freaking awesome. I have two of them around our pool area and they rock the whole neighborhood if I turn them up loud enough. The sound quality is precise and the base rumbles the ground. Awesome purchase, I don't regret spending the extra money on the Bose 51.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are larger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I bought a pair for outside. The speakers are definitely quite a bit larger than I imagined based on the photos. I installed them myself - I’d suggest doing a fair amount of research before buying speaker wire. I ran mine outside from the basement, drilled a hole and figured out the line was probably sufficient for outdoor quality. I ran mine through conduit but my initial wire wasn’t rated for direct burial so I re-wired everything which was a little painful. Go for direct burial wire - and research the gauge before committing to purchase. The process of hooking up to speakers is quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought two to replace the $80 version that I had installed about 6 years ago. These have far better sound quality and much better build quality. Definitely worth the purchase and I bought another set to replace the other two cheap speakers after the huge difference in sound quality. Four of these around our pool area and we'll be rockin' the neighborhood! Well, loud enough for us to enjoy cuz we're not THOSE neighbors...
customer_reviews.author: R. Kepler

customer_reviews.title: My Speakers survived flooding.
customer_reviews.text: My Bose speakers have survived two floods. I have two pair. The first is over three years old and has been under water twice. The second has been under water once. Both still work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Sims

customer_reviews.title: Large outdoor space sonically sounds as good as if indoors!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed these tonight, so this is a very early review. The sound is very, very good. The large pool area where these are installed now sonically sounds as if I'm indoors - they really fill the large, outdoor space with a warm, enveloping sound. I was apprehensive about paying so much for these; however I have truly never been disappointed with Bose products or their customer service. These speakers sound great and I truly hope they will withstand many years of four-season weather here in the northeast. Time will tell, but others' longer-term experiences with these speakers strongly suggests they'll hold up just fine. KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK, BOSE!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Speaker failed in less than 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Manufacturer won’t stand behind product. Amazon won’t let you return. Don’t buy. Speaker stopped working in less than 6 weeks. Bose tried to charge be $75 for a repair. Amazon does not allow you to return. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound great - but expensive I have these outside for a few weeks now.. in the rain and now cold.. they still work great.. .lets see how they hold up throughout the hot texas summer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lossau

customer_reviews.title: Broke Quick
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in August 2019, but just installed them in April of 2020... They worked great, while it lasted. Only a month later, one speaker stopped functioning properly with FUZZY and unclear sound. I have since thrown away the box to return, since I figured BOSE of impeccable reputation, speakers wouldn't break in 3 months. I want a replacement from Bose since even though I have only used them for 3 months, I am still within their one year Warranty window. Amazon, can you please tell me how to get in contact for replacement speakers!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Chesney

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: My first set finally died after 15 years of use. The replacements are nearly identical and that's a good thing as the sound quality is great, even at a low volume. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Neil S. Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Bose is the best!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking at some cheaper speakers to put around our pool but I’m so glad we went with these instead! We’ve had lots of different Bose products and never been disappointed! We put two of them around our 40x30ish pool deck and they sound amazing! Turn them up a bit and they fill our whole (large) back yard with beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.author: Kippy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used these speakers for several weeks now, and I can tell you they are worth every penny you spend. Excellent sound quality! I've always had good things to say about Bose speakers, and these are no different. I installed these around my pool and my guests have continuously complimented the sound quality, especially considering they are outdoor speakers. Don't waste your money on cheap ones, these will be worth the cost and you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: No Compromises
customer_reviews.text: Can you really put a price value on sound ?? If you could, this is what it would sound like!! No compromises, just performs day in day out, and consistently sounds Amazing!! I can’t quantify on a post..,, but hear me out. Imagine in being in presence of music without it blasting your eardrums.. that’s what it’s like
customer_reviews.author: Kaindya

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, my first purchase was the look alike speakers for a lot less.. well I got what I paid for and was extremely disappointed in the sound quality. I figured, bad sound quality is about as bad as it gets.. what is the point. So I stepped up to Bose and spent more $$ but expected it to pay off. It did, great sound. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Hotel quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speakers. We feel like we are hanging by the pool at the Belagio. Amazing quality and clarity. When we turn up the volume you can hear the music across the street with clarity!! Amazing and easy set up!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Best yard speakers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, sound amazing as expected. Have lasted over a year in the las vegas sun and haven't faded.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: THEY love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a customer... 2 sets around their custom hot tub & surrounding wood decking... THEY love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg A Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Sound great perfect for our multi-level deck, because of the all around sound.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers came fast and sound great. They are fairly easy to install, but it is a little difficult to keep the excess wire under the speakers, while keeping it lined up with cutouts for the wire, while screwing the speakers to my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and rugged.
customer_reviews.text: Read specs. Much larger than I expected but I didn’t read. Sound way better than comparable outdoor speakers. I’ve had 2 types of synthetic rock speakers and these blow them away.
customer_reviews.author: jven

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth every penny. Great sound and easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I was tempted to buy similar looking cheaper speakers. Glad I didn't!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: awesome speakers my husband and I put them on our ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome speakers my husband and I put them on our deck unprotected and have never had a problem. It sounds like surround sound on my 30' deck! highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Broken speaker
customer_reviews.text: Broken speaker right out of the box. Box seems to be undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Scarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Very high pitched, couldn’t get enough bass
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up, I am a Bose person and dislike these very much.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Excellent sound paired with Sonos:Connect Amp. While not extremely loud with the Sonos Amp, they get loud enough and fill our yard fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Zislin

customer_reviews.title: Bose are the best!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best outdoor, all-weather speakers. This seller had them delivered quickly, and well-packed. They are in my backyard producing great stereo sound!
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: Glad I spent the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in 2011. They have great sound and are still going strong. We left them out for a few winters but now we bring them in at the end of fall. The sound is still awrsome!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper7

customer_reviews.title: Best..
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are absolutely ridiculous!!!!! We have just built a deck around our pool...1500sqft of deck. It's Oct 7 and were still outside listening. Best...BEST investment made!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: robert koch

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: One speaker Is blown... Bose is telling me it’s our of warranty... only purchased last August... always had good luck with Bose’s products... Very disappointed...for the cost of the speakers should’ve held up much better
customer_reviews.author: PAUL J ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Have heard these many times at hotels, resorts, etc. They're tough and produce excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: JAT

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speakers. Work best with some hard surface to reflect off of. Free Space sound is decent but much better where sound can resonate off of the fence and house.
customer_reviews.author: Indymike

customer_reviews.title: Sound fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These sound terrific for outdoor speakers. Solid bass with clear mids and highs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Perfectly fine thru snow, tropical storms sun and heat. First set lasted 17 years!
customer_reviews.author: GoodShopper

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Just buy them. They are so worth it! Clear Bose sound with a deep 8 inch bump! My neighbors hate me, but my backyard music sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.author: EJoot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No other outdoor speakers compare to these. This is what all other companies try to duplicate.
customer_reviews.author: Mike64

customer_reviews.title: Ordered one charged and sent three sets
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one set got three and charged for three and would not let me return.
customer_reviews.author: Sharolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Just hooked up sounds amazing sound is full and punchy sounds very wide you can hear it from the neighbors house loud and clean
customer_reviews.author: Hotroy

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SPEAKERS ON THE PLANET!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned and used 4 of these speakers in my back yard for 8 years now (and I just bought more). They sound better than my indoor Bose speakers! They sound like you are at an outdoor concert!!! You MUST use 12 gauge underground landscaping cable to get a quality sound and prevent any corrosive wiring problems! These well-made speakers will stay perfect in ALL kinds of weather! BUY THEM NOW AND ENJOY THEM FOR A LIFETIME!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound great value.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Bluetooth adapter for my receiver ran 12/2 speaker wire sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: dan hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Bose Free Space 51: A "Sound" decision!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair and installed on our deck for my wife who loves to sit out and listen to her music. Installation was easy and sound is incredible. Can't say much yet about durability as I've only had them for about a month. I saw one reviewer who complained because they only lasted for five years! Get a life guy. Most marriages don't last for five years! A nice solid set of speakers. Buy them and you'll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and amazing sound from these speakers. You won't be disappointed. Have them around my new deck and they provide excellent listening enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: These sound great and are unobtrusive. Great addition to my patio during the summer. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Louis Dachis

customer_reviews.title: No better experience!
customer_reviews.text: Amazed how crisp and clear the pair of outdoor speakers are. From music to movies. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penney
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these for three years and they still work perfectly and look great, even in Wisconsin winters. The Bose speakers are worth every penny and provide a beautiful sound for your outdoor space. Do not waste your money on less expensive brands, purchase the Bose you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: I am terribly lazy and do not even cover them in winter
customer_reviews.text: My second set-they are tremendous! Very durable and weather tolerant. I am terribly lazy and do not even cover them in winter. My first set is over 6 years old and they still sound amazing. This set was a present for my mother who has been impressed with our backyard sound system for years~
customer_reviews.author: Carol Garrison

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are amazing! Incredible sound and bass
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are amazing! Incredible sound and bass. We have them installed in our backyard landscaping and they are not even noticeable in amongst the plants. Everyone that comes over and hears the music is so impressed and wants to buy a set. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Will&nan

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor speaker system
customer_reviews.text: These are great speakers. Totally water proof and easy to install they offer very great sound for the money. Outdoor speakers often sound very flat, but these offer more dynamic range and good base response.
customer_reviews.author: G 34957

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds coming from these speakers around our pool. Not affected by sprinkler systems or downpours.
customer_reviews.author: rosalie boerstler

customer_reviews.title: Spent the money after trying others, worth it in the end!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few other speakers before biting the bullet and spending the money on these Bose speakers. (Such asand) I wasn't ready to pay the higher cost for something that, on paper, doesn't look like it would be that good of a speaker. But in the end, they sound great. Even with 100 watts each going to these speakers with 12 gauge wife, they're not THAT loud - but loud enough. It's a well rounded sound that at lower volume levels really provide a good experience. If you turn it up loud, however - the base will bottom out.
customer_reviews.author: lux4rd0

customer_reviews.title: Great 360 degrees sound
customer_reviews.text: Great for pool area where sound is necessary in all directions. Easy to install. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Idoc

customer_reviews.title: Work great, put two out by pool
customer_reviews.text: Packaging nedds to be addressed. Board strength very light, no dividers to hold speakers in place. Work great , put two out by pool ,all the speaker you need.
customer_reviews.author: darrel bostic

customer_reviews.title: Wayniac
customer_reviews.text: I have these speakers hooked up with 5 other various pairs of outdoor speakers. the Bose sure help to fill in the bottom end all around you
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Grabski

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers
customer_reviews.text: These sound great and really fill up the entire yard with sound. Base sounds better when volume is turned up Update: I have been listening to these speakers for a few weeks now and the sound awesome. The quality of the sounds is simply outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Rob B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sounding speakers. They are very easy to install. The sound is crystal clear and projects sound evenly 360 degrees around the speaker. They are useable and blend nicely with the landscaping. Definetly a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding speakers for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sounding speakers. We ran wire out by our pool and you can hear them all over. They are amazing
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for around the pool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for around the pool. The sound is great. We are in Minnesota and they have held up perfectly with the frigid weather...Bose doesn't disappoint...
customer_reviews.author: Sebastien Tournier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speakers!!...You will not be disapointed. The 360 sound makes them great to for placement as well. So if your in front, back, or side of them sound is the same. Would not get this affect with regular outdoor speakers..
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: These sound great
customer_reviews.text: I've got them in my gardens outside and the sound is fantastic. I love how it emanates from the garden in a circular manner. This avoids loud spots that can happen with a directional speaker. The sound is clear and pleasant, and if you want you can turn it up and get it pretty loud while staying clear and distortion free.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous outdoor speakears
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, crystal clear sound, easy to install, nice looking- thats how i describe these speakers. we used them for our recent party and it really enhanced our audio for the evening
customer_reviews.author: singapore

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I AM A HUGE BOSE FAN AND THESE SPEAKERS DID NOT DISAPPOINT ! I LIKE MY MUSIC LOUD ! THE SOUND QUALITY IS AMAZING ... CRYSTAL CLEAR ... EASY INSTALL AND I PLAY EVERYTHING RIGHT FROM MY IPHONE ! 5 STARS :)
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE ANDRETTI

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: have had them for 3 years, great sound, color is as new, easy to install...great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and paired them with a set of Bose Environmental 251 speakers, a Bose SoundTouch SA-5 amp, and a Niles GSS10 subwoofer. My backyard rocks! The system sounds great around the pool and has plenty of power to irritate the neighbors. I definitely recommend a subwoofer - it makes a world of difference. These speakers are loud, clear, and super easy to install. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Brian R

customer_reviews.title: ~Outstanding product~
customer_reviews.text: These speakers exceeded my expirations. They were bigger than I expected. Good Lord, the sound is great. Where they really shine is when you turn up the volume. You definetly get your monies worth. Look no further than these speakers for outdoor sound. I have my speakers hooked up to a Sonos Connect: amp for streaming wirelessly from my back yard. Very simple set up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: "OUTSTANDING"
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at Bose Free Space 51 Outdoor In -Ground Speakers for about three or four years. I thought they were a little pricey, but I have never questioned the quality of the product. I received speakers about two weeks ago, I have not regret one dollar yet! "Outstanding" Thank you!! A E Benjamin
customer_reviews.author: Arnold E. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Best speakers I've ever heard outside!
customer_reviews.text: They are worth every penny! They are loud and very clear. I have them around my pool and they are awesome. I live on an acre and can hear them around the property!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great! I have them in my flower beds on each side of my back patio and just love them.
customer_reviews.author: LITETHUND

customer_reviews.title: Deinitely ALL WEATHER  speakers. Leave them outside and they keep on going.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a housewarming present a year ago and my friend still loves them. He has a beautiful outside pool area and these put out great audio. We do live in Florida near the ocean and have lots of salt water air amd very hot days as well as heavy down pouring rain and he has had no issues with these all weather speakers.
customer_reviews.author: j brad g

customer_reviews.title: Loud!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers! Super loud and are completely weatherproof. Kind of a pain to wire them but worth it once it's done!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Lang

customer_reviews.title: Awsome speakers
customer_reviews.text: I got these and hooked them up in my back yard, they sound great! Even in the rain we now sit in the terrace to watch rain and enjoy music. The service was awsome, the package arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Teothefarmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted weather-proof outdoor speakers with great sound, but I didn't want to permanently mount them to my house... These speakers fit the bill perfectly. I connected them to the "Zone 2" channels on my Marantz SR6005 A/V receiver, and I've been very happy with their performance. The speakers are configured to be partially buried in the ground, but I prefer to store mine in the house when I am not using them... The weather-proof construction gives me peace of mind if I get sidetracked and leave them outside for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Speakers sound great but received 1 that was broken on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Speakers sound great but received 1 that was broken on the bottom. Since this doesn't affect the sound, we installed them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Hart

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: These sound awesome. We have a pool and placed these on the patio and can hear all over the yard/pool without distortion. Basically cant turn up too loud. Might disturb neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wayne Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best Outdoor Speaker (If not covered)
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 sets of Bose outdoor speakers - One set under a veranda roof and these out by my pool. These are the best you can get if you need something that will be integrated in landscaping, etc. If you can place the speakers under cover or attach them to your house I would recommend the other Bose outdoor speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Outdoor Surround Sound
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible speakers. We have a pool with these on two ends and they throw incredible surround all through our 2 acre yard. Had two weddings and the music jockeys ended up using these to push sound instead of their own systems. Love them. Wish I had bought two more but the two do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great value and sound
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying a " knock off" to save a few bucks....they sounded decent but only lasted about a year... If you are considering anything less than these BOSE ......Learn from my mistake....spend the money....they are far superior to any other speaker of this type.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Bose Free Space 51 Speakers
customer_reviews.text: The sound is brilliant.....and they arrived earlier than I had anticipated. I am extremely happy with the product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: I installed these five years ago and they still look and sound great. I placed mine in my flower gardens so they would be covered during the summer, and they still sound great. With the 360 degree sound my neighbors and friends are amazed when they find out where sound is coming from. I could have paid less for other speakers, but I am very happy with these and expect years of satisfaction. Update June 3, 2014.. Even after our record cold and snow this winter (Chicago area), the speakers were buried under snow from mid December to early March, the speakers still sound great. 8 years and counting.
customer_reviews.author: Happy one

customer_reviews.title: One speaker arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: One of my speakers arrived broken. The speakers sound great I am concerned about water going into the speaker that is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Mac lean

product_meta.title: Bose Free Space 51 Outdoor In-Ground Speakers (Green) - 31763
product_meta.description: Style:SinglePlace them By the pool, on the deck or in the garden. Bose free space speakers are Our best-performing and most versatile outdoor speakers. Connect them to your existing audio equipment and enjoy exciting stereo sound over a wide listening area. You can place them on or in the ground, so they're a great alternative to mounting speakers to your home. And they're designed to stay outside all year long. The flexibility of free space 51 speakers allows you to partially bury them in the ground or easily install them on Hard surfaces. The speaker base has three mounting holes for solid and secure placement. Grooves on the underside of the base allow you to neatly tuck in wires. This ensures that the wire doesn't cause rocking and provides a simple and professional-looking installation on a deck or patio. With meticulous design and rewarding performance, free space 51 speakers are an ideal choice for outdoor listening pleasure. Polymer fibre composite driver cone ensures high quality sound reproduction that is resistant to the type of deterioration often caused by extreme conditions.
feature_bullets: Downward firing 4 1/4 full range driver.Dimensions Each speaker:36 cm H x 32 cm W x 32 cm D
Innovative radial design disperse sound in a 360 degree pattern and centrally located port enhances low frequency performance to deliver the depth and richness of music outdoors
Base flange with mounting holes for easy installation
Rugged, flexible design withstands temperatures from 40 to +150 degrees Fahrenheit, and passed the rigorous salt fog test 66 percent longer than required by the Marine Industry Standard
Recommended power 10 100 watts and withstands up to 350 pounds of pressure

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars252 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
